addon.name: [COLOR orange]G[/COLOR]UIDO[COLOR orange]S[/COLOR] [COLOR orange]S[/COLOR]KINBAS[COLOR orange]E[/COLOR] Only Skins for 16

extension.description: In Guidos SKINBASE findet ihr Skins ab Kodi Version 16 aus aller Welt. Von den Standard Skins bis hin zu stark Modifizierten. Die Skins sind für die jeweiligen Kodi Versionen farblich markiert. Viel Spass wünschen euch das SKINBASE TEAM.

In Guido's SKINBASE you will find skins from Kodi version 16 from all over the world. From the standard skins to heavily modified ones. The skins are color coded for the respective Kodi versions. The SKINBASE TEAM wish you a lot of fun.

Main Repository for Aeon Nox: SiLVO

addon.name: [COLOR orange]G[/COLOR]UIDO[COLOR orange]S[/COLOR] [COLOR orange]S[/COLOR]KINBAS[COLOR orange]E[/COLOR] Only Skins for 16

extension.description: In Guidos SKINBASE findet ihr Skins für die Kodi Versionen von 16 bis 19 aus aller Welt. Die Skins sind für die jeweiligen Kodi Versionen farblich markiert. Des weiteren findet ihr auch weitere Repos sowie alle Addons Abhängikeiten in der Repo die für die Skins benötigt werden. Die SkinBase wird ständig erweitert und verbessert. Hinzugekommen sind Skins mit Topics Loader , diese sind EXTRA mit Roter schrift versehen und ermöglichen mit einem Skin unzählige Themen oder Hintergrundbilder zu wechseln. Viel Spass wünschen euch Guido und sowie das SKINBASE TEAM.

In Guidos SKINBASE you will find skins for the Kodi versions from 16 to 19 from all over the world. The skins are color-coded for the respective Kodi versions. Furthermore, you will also find other repos and all addons dependencies in the repo that are required for the skins. The SkinBase is constantly being expanded and improved. Added to this are skins with Topics Loader, these are EXTRA with red letters and allow you to change countless themes or background images with one skin. Guido and the SKINBASE TEAM wish you lots of fun.
White Recordlabel Icons

extension.news: [fix] use xbmcvfs.translatePath when available, xbmc.translatePath deprecated(Matrix) and removed(Nexus) |contrib: Gujal00|
extension.summary: A common caching API for Kodi add-ons.
extension.description: A common caching API for Kodi add-ons.

This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, rottentomatoes.com, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Exposes fanart as skin properties for slideshows, etc
extension.description: Uses the Kodi database to grab all fanart from media items and put it into a skin property for use by skins/slideshows as previous version of XBMC allowed.
Script for skinners to let users select an image resource addon.

extension.summary: Helper module for Event handling in WindowXMLs
extension.description: Helper module to allow mapping Actions, Onfocus and click events via decorators
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2.1, February 1999

extension.description: Provides signal/slot mechanism for inter-addon communication

extension.summary: Arrow: better dates and times for Python
extension.description: Packed for Kodi from https://github.com/crsmithdev/arrow
Module providing some AutoCompletion functions
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2.1, February 1999

extension.description: Packed for Kodi from https://github.com/jaraco/backports.functools_lru_cache

extension.summary: HTML/XML parser for quick-turnaround applications like screen-scraping
extension.description: Beautiful Soup parses arbitrarily invalid SGML and provides a variety of methods and Pythonic idioms for iterating and searching the parse tree.

extension.summary: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module
extension.description: The dateutil module provides powerful extensions to the datetime module available in the Python standard library.

extension.summary: Metadata and artwork from common sources like TMDB, IMDB, TADB and fanart.tv
extension.description: The metadata and artwork module for Kodi provides rich metadata, including artwork for various metatypes by scraping (and caching) this information from sites like TMDB, musicbrainz and fanart.tv.

extension.summary: Python bindings for Musicbrainz' NGS webservice
extension.description: Kodi module library for the Python bindings for Musicbrainz' NGS webservice developed by alastair.
Packed for KODI from https://github.com/kennethreitz/requests

extension.summary: Provides a simple file- and memory based cache for Kodi addons
extension.description: Provides a simple file- and memory based cache for Kodi addons

extension.summary: Simple, fast, extensible JSON encoder/decoder for Python
extension.description: Simple, fast, extensible JSON encoder/decoder for Python
extension.disclaimer: Code taken from https://pypi.org/project/simplejson/
extension.license: MIT License, Academic Free License v. 2.1

extension.description: Six is a Python 2 and 3 compatibility library. It provides utility functions for smoothing over the differences between the Python versions with the goal of writing Python code that is compatible on both Python versions. See the documentation for more information on what is provided.

extension.summary: T9 search dialog including AutoCompletion (to be used by add-ons)
extension.description: T9 search dialog including AutoCompletion (to be used by add-ons)

extension.summary: TheTVDB API v2 python module for Kodi
extension.description: TheTVDB API v2 python module for Kodi

extension.summary: ASCII transliterations of Unicode text by Sean M. Burke and Tomaz Solc
extension.description: ASCII transliterations of Unicode text by Sean M. Burke and Tomaz Solc
extension.disclaimer: Code taken from https://pypi.org/project/Unidecode

extension.summary: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction
extension.description: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction for hundreds of sites. Version is based on youtube-dl date version: YY.MDD.V where V is the addon specific sub-version. Also provides downloading with the option for background downloading with a queue and queue manager.
extension.summary: Βοηθητική μονάδα πρόσβασης στους επιλυτές youtube-dl για την εξαγωγή ροών βίντεο
extension.description: Βοηθητική μονάδα πρόσβασης στους επιλυτές youtube-dl για την εξαγωγή ροών βίντεο από εκατοντάδες ιστότοπους. Η έκδοση βασίζεται στην έκδοση ημερομηνίας του youtube-dl: EE.MHH.EK όπου ΕΚ η υπό-έκδοση συγκεκριμένα για το πρόσθετο. Επιπλέον δίνει δυνατότητα μεταφόρτωσης στο παρασκήνιο με ουρά και διαχειριστή αυτής.
extension.summary: Módulo que proporciona acceso a YouTube-dl para la extracción de flujos de video
extension.description: Módulo que proporciona acceso a YouTube-dl para la extracción de flujos de video de cientos de sitios. La versión está basada en la versión de fecha youtube-dl: YY.MDD.V donde V es la subversión específica del complemento. También permite descargas con la opción de descarga en segundo plano con una cola y un administrador de colas.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Helper service for Kodi skins
Добавка за облици, която осигурява просто управление и списък с потребителски преки пътища (изисква поддръжка от облика)
Add-on für Skins für einfache Bearbeitung und Auflistung von benutzerdefinierten Verknüpfungen (erfordert Skin-Unterstützung)
Πρόσθετο για κελύφη, το οποίο παρέχει έναν απλό τρόπο διαχείρισης και κατηγοριοποίησης των συντομεύσεων του χρήστη (πρέπει να υποστηρίζεται από το κέλυφος)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Complemento para las pieles para proporcionar una gestión sencilla y lista de atajos de usuario (requiere que la piel lo soporte)
Addiciel pour habillages qui fournit une gestion simple et un listage des raccourcis utilisateurs (exige la prise en charge de l'habillage)
Complemento que fornece aos temas dunha xestión sinxela dos atallos dos usuarios (require soporte do tema)
Dodatak za presvlake koja omogućava jednostavno upravljanje i prikaz korisnikovih prečaca (zahtijeva podršku presvlake)
Felszín kiegészítő amely könnyen kezelhetővé és listázhatóvá teszi a felhasználói parancsikonokat (Felszín támogatás szükséges)
Viðbót fyrir viðmót til að halda utan um flýtivísa og fá yfirlit yfir þá (þarfnast stuðnings frá viðmóti)
Add-on per gli skin per consentire un facile gestione ed elenco delle scorciatoie utente (richiede che lo skin lo supporti)
Priedas teminėms išvaizdoms, kad jos turėtų galimybę paprastai tvarkyti ir atvaizduoti vartotojo sukurtas nuorodas (reikalingas teminės išvaizdos palaikymas)
Add-on voor skins om te voorzien in het eenvoudig beheren en sorteren van gebruikers snelkoppelingen (vereist skin ondersteuning)
Tillegg for enkel administrering og opplisting av bruker-snarveier i tema (krever støtte i tema)
Wtyczka dla skór, która zapewnia proste zarządzanie i tworzenie list skrótów użytkownika (wymaga wsparcia skóry)
Um add-on que permite que os temas tenham recursos simples para gerir e listar atalhos de utilizadores (é necessário suporte do tema)
Add-on para que as skins possam prover gerenciamento de lista de atalhos para o menu principal (requer suporte da skin)
Дополнение для обложек, предоставляющее простой способ управления и список пользовательских ярлыков (требуется поддержка обложкой)
Skinntillägg som tillhandahåller enkel hantering och översikt av användargenvägar (om skinnet stöder det)
插件为皮肤提供了简单的管理和用户连接方式列表 (需要皮肤支持)

extension.summary: Kodi Version Check checks if you are running latest released version.
Проверява дали ползвате най-новата версия на Kodi.
Kodi Version Check comprova si està utilitzant la última versió publicada.
Kontrola verze Kodi, zkontroluje, zda používáte nejnovější vydanou verzi.
Kodi undersøger om du benytter den nyeste version.
Kodi Versionsprüfung prüft, ob die neuste Version von Kodi installiert ist.
Ο Έλεγχος Έκδοσης Kodi εξετάζει αν έχετε την πιο πρόσφατη έκδοση του προγράμματος.
Kodi Version Check checks if you are running latest released version.
Kodi Version Check checks if you are running latest released version.
Kodi Version Check checks if you are running latest released version.
Kodi Version Check comprueba si está ejecutando la última versión de Kodi.
Comprobador de Version de Kodi comprueba si se esta ejecutando ultima version publicada.
Kodi Version Check tarkistaa onko käyttämäsi uusin versio.
Le contrôle de version de Kodi vérifie si la dernière version sortie est utilisée.
Le contrôleur de version Kodi vérifie si vous utilisez la dernière version parue.
Kodi Version Check verifica se está a executar a última versión.
בודק גרסת Kodi מוודא אם אתה מריץ את הגרסה הרשמית האחרונה.
Kodi provjeritelj inačice provjerava imate li posljednju inačicu izdanja.
Az Kodi verzió ellenőrző megvizsgálja, hogy a legújabb kiadást futtatja-e.
Kodi Version Check mengecek apakah Anda menggunakan versi rilis terbaru.
Kodi Version Check athugar hvort þú sért að keyra nýjustu viðurkennda útgáfu.
Kodi Version Check verifica se hai l'ultima versione rilasciata
Kodi Version Checks는 최신 정식 릴리즈 버전을 사용중인지 검사해줍니다.
Kodi Version Check patikrina ar naudojate naujausią versiją.
Kodi versie-check controleert of je de laatst beschikbare versie hebt.
Kodi Versjonsettersyn sjekker om du kjører den sist utgitte versjonen.
Dodatek Version Check sprawdza czy używasz najnowszej wersji Kodi.
O Kodi Version Check verifica se a sua versão de lançamento do Kodi está actualizada.
Kodi Version Check verifica se você está executando a versão mais recente.
Verificare versiune Kodi verifică dacă folosiți ultima versiune lansată.
Kodi Version Check проверяет если вы используете последнюю версию
Kodi Kontrola verzií overuje, či používate najnovšiu vydanú verziu.
Preverjanje različice Kodi preveri, če imate nameščeno nazadnje izdano različico.
Kodi Version Check kontrollerar om du använder den senaste versionen.
Kodi Sürüm Kontrol yayınlanmış son sürümü kullanıp kullanmadığınızı kontrol eder.
Kodi 版本检查检查你使用的是否为最新发布的版本。
extension.description: Kodi Version Check only supports a number of platforms/distros as releases may differ between them. For more information visit the kodi.tv website.
Kodi Version Check поддържа няколко платформи/дистрибуции. За повече информация посетете страницата www.kodi.tv

Kodi Version Check només és compatible amb una sèrie de plataformes / distribucions ja que les ultimes versions poden ser diferents entre elles. Per obtenir més informació, visiteu el lloc web kodi.tv.
Kontrola verze Kodi podporuje pouze několik platforem/distribucí a verze mezi nimi se můžou lišit. Pro více informací navštivte webové stránky kodi.tv.
Kodi kan kun undersøge for opdateringer for visse platforme/udgaver, da der kan være forskel. For mere information, besøg kodi.tv.
Kodi Versionsprüfung unterstützt nur ein paar Plattformen/Distributionen, da sich die jeweiligen Veröffentlichungen unterscheiden können. Für weitere Informationen besuchen Sie die kodi.tv-Webseite.
Ο Έλεγχος Έκδοσης Kodi υποστηρίζει μόνο ορισμένα λειτουργικά συστήματα/διανομές, καθώς οι εκδόσεις διαφέρουν για το καθένα. Για περισσότερες πληροφορίες επισκεφθείτε το kodi.tv
Kodi Version Check only supports a number of platforms/distros as releases may differ between them. For more information visit the kodi.tv website.
Kodi Version Check only supports a number of platforms/distros as releases may differ between them. For more information visit the kodi.tv website.
Kodi Version Check only supports a number of platforms/distros as releases may differ between them. For more information visit the kodi.tv website.
Kodi Version Check solo soporta un número limitado de plataformas/distribuciones, ya que los lanzamientos pueden diferir entre ellos. Para más información, visite la web de kodi.tv.
Kodi Version Check tukee vain joitain alustoja/distroja koska julkaisut saattavat poiketa toisistaan. Saadaksesi lisätietoa, vieraile kodi.tv:ssä.

Le contrôle de version de Kodi ne prend en charge qu'un certain nombre de plate-formes/distributions car les versions peuvent varier entre elles. Pour plus d'informations, consulter le site Web kodi.tv.
Le contrôleur de version Kodi ne prend en charge qu'un certain nombre de plate-formes/distributions car les versions peuvent varier entre elles. Pour plus d'informations, visitez le site Web kodi.tv.
Kodi Version Check só soporta un número limitado de plataformas/distribucións, xa que os lanzamentos poden diferir entre eles. Para máis información visitar o sitio web de kodi.tv.
בודק גרסת Kodi תומך רק במספר פלטפורמות/הפצות מאחר שסימון הגרסאות שונה בין אחת לשניה. למידע נוסף בקר באתר kodi.tv.
Kodi provjeritelj inačice samo podržava broj platformi/distribucija koliko to dopuštaju pojedina izdanja. Za više informacija posjetite kodi.tv web stranicu.
Az Kodi verzió-ellenőrző csak néhány platformot / disztribúciót támogat, mert a kiadások között különbségek lehetnek. További információkért keresse fel az kodi.tv oldalt.
Kodi Version Check hanya mendukung beberapa platform/distro karena rilisnya mungkin berbeda-beda. Untuk informasi lebih lanjut kunjungi situs kodi.tv.
Kodi Version Check supporta un numero di piattaforme e distribuzioni diverse tra loro. Per più informazioni visita il sito kodi.tv
Kodi Versio Check는 일부 플랫폼/배포본만을 지원합니다. 자세한 정보는 kodi.tv 웹사이트에서 확인하세요
Kodi Version Check palaiko tik kelias platformas/distribucijas, nes leidimai tarp jų gali skirtis. Norėdami gauti daugiau informacijos, apsilankykite Kodi.tv puslapyje.
Kodi versie check ondersteunt alleen een aantal platforms/distro`s omdat uitgaven verschillen tussen hen. Voor meer informatie bezoek de kodi.tv website.
Kodi Versjonsettersyn støtter kun noen plattformer/distribusjoner fordi utgivelser kan være forskjellige mellom dem. Besøk kodi.tv for mer informasjon.
Dodatek Version Check wspiera tylko część platform i dystrybucji. Więcej informacji na stronie kodi.tv
O Kodi Version Check suporta apenas algumas plataformas/distribuições, porque os lançamentos podem não ser sempre idênticos. Para mais informação, visite o site kodi.tv.
Verificador de versões do Kodi somente suporta algumas plataformas/distros em que os lançamentos podem diferenciar entre si. Para maiores informações visite o website kodi.tv.
Проверка новых версий Kodi поддерживается только на ряде платформ/дистрибутивов и они могут различаться между собой. Для получения доп. информации посетите сайт kodi.tv
Preverjanje različice Kodi podpira le nekatere platforme/distribucije, saj se izdaje med njimi lahko zelo razlikujejo. Za več informacij obiščite spletišče kodi.tv
Kodi Version Check stöder endeast ett antal plattformar/distributioner eftersom utgivningar kan skilja mellan dessa. För mer information besök kodi.tv webplatsen.
Kodi Sürüm Kontrol sürümler arasında değişiklik olduğu için sadece birkaç platform/dağıtım destekler. Daha fazla bilgi için kodi.tv web sitesini ziyaret edin.
Kodi 版本检查只支持部分平台/发行版，它们之间的版本可能会有所不同。欲了解更多信息，请访问 kodi.tv 网站。

extension.summary: Aeon Nox 5: Redux - Sự trở về
extension.description: Redux: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Redux: Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Redux: Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Redux: Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeon:lta.
Redux : complètement revu pour créer une apparence moderne, en gardant l'impression classique d'Aeon.
Redux : complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon.
Redux: עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Redux: Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Redux: Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Redux: Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Redux: Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
Redux: 고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Redux: pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Redux: Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Redux: Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Redux: Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen.
Redux: Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Redux: Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Redux: Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Redux: полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Redux: Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Redux: Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
Redux: การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Redux: Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.

Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.

extension.summary: Ein von Apple TV inspiriertes Skin für Kodi
Ένα κέλυφος για το Kodi, εμπνευσμένο από το Apple TV
A AppleTV inspired skin for Kodi
An AppleTV inspired skin for Kodi
A AppleTV inspired skin for Kodi
A AppleTV inspired skin for Kodi
Un habillage pour Kodi inspiré de l'AppleTV
Un habillage pour Kodi inspiré d'AppleTV
Un tema para Kodi inspirado no AppleTV
Una skin per Kodi ispirata a AppleTV
애플 TV에 영감을 받은 Kodi용 스킨
Kulit yang diilham dari AppleTV untuk Kodi
Een op AppleTV geïnspireerde skin voor Kodi
Um tema para o Kodi inspirado na AppleTV
Uma Skin inspirada na Apple TV
extension.description: AppTV ist ein vom Apple TV inspiriertes Skin für Kodi. Es bietet eine sehr ressourcensparende, minimalistische Benutzeroberfläche und gleichzeitig Zugang zu den erweiterten Kodi-Funktionen, die nicht in der originalen Apple TV-Oberfläche vorhanden sind.

Το AppTV είναι ένα κέλυφος για το Kodi, εμπνευσμένο από το AppleTV. Διαθέτει ένα ιδιαίτερα ελαφρύ, μινιμαλιστικό περιβάλλον εργασίας, ενώ παρέχει πρόσβαση σε ένα πλήθος προχωρημένων λειτουργιών του Kodi που δεν είναι διαθέσιμες στο πρωτότυπο περιβάλλον του AppleTV.

AppTV is a AppleTV inspired skin for Kodi. It provides a very light weight minimalist gui while also allowing access to a number of advanced Kodi features not available in the original AppleTV interface.

AppTV is an AppleTV inspired skin for Kodi. It provides a very light weight minimalist gui while also allowing access to a number of advanced Kodi features not available in the original AppleTV interface.

AppTV is a AppleTV inspired skin for Kodi. It provides a very light weight minimalist gui while also allowing access to a number of advanced Kodi features not available in the original AppleTV interface.

AppTV is a AppleTV inspired skin for Kodi. It provides a very light weight minimalist gui while also allowing access to a number of advanced Kodi features not available in the original AppleTV interface.

AppTV est un habillage pour Kodi inspiré de l'AppleTV. Il fournit une interface minimaliste légère tout en permettant l'accès à bon nombre des caractéristiques avancées de Kodi non disponibles dans l'interface AppleTV d'origine.

AppTV est un habillage pour Kodi inspiré d'AppleTV. Il propose une IUG très légère et minimaliste tout en permettant l'accès à plusieurs fonctions avancées de Kodi qui ne sont pas proposées dans l'interface originale d'AppleTV.

AppTV è una skin ispirata a AppleTV per Kodi. Fornisce un'interfaccia molto leggera e minimalistica e permette di accedere ad alcune funzioni avanzate di Kodi non disponibili nell'interfaccia originale di AppleTV.
AppTV는 애플TV에서 영감을 받아 만든 Kodi용 스킨입니다. GUI를 최소화하여 가벼우면서도 애플TV 인터페이스에서는 사용할 수 없는 Kodi의 여러가지 고급 기능을 사용할 수 있습니다.

AppTV yra AppleTV įkvėpta teminė išvaizda, skirta Kodi. Ji suteikia labai lengvą, minimalistinę grafinę vartotojo sąsają, tuo pačiu suteikiant galimybę naudoti daugelį pažangių Kdi funkcijų, kurių nėra originalioje AppleTV sąsajoje.

AppTV adalah kulit yang diilham dari AppleTV untuk Kodi. Ia menyediakan gui minimalis yang sangat ringkas juga membolehkan capaian ke beberapa fitur lanjutan Kodi yang tidak tersedia dalam antaramuka AppleTV yang asal.

AppTV is een op AppleTV geïnspireerde skin voor Kodi. het voorziet in een zeer lichtgewichte minimalistische gui terwijl eveneens toegang is tot een aantal geavanceerde Kodi features die niet beschikbaar zijn in de orginele AppleTV interface.

ApplTV jest skórą inspirowaną wyglądem interfejsu AppleTV. Dostarcza wyjątkowo lekki i minimalistyczny interfejs użytkownika umożliwiający dostęp do wielu zaawansowanych funkcji Kodi, niedostępnych w oryginalnym interfejsie AppleTV.

AppTV é uma skin inspirada na AppleTV para Kodi. Fornece uma GUI bem leve e minimalista ao mesmo empo que permite acesso a inúmeras funções avançadas do Kodinão disponíveis na interface original da AppleTV.
